attributes.action: Cap Football Leagues Spending Annualy on Players
attributes.additional_details: Stop the Football League throwing around silly money on players.Spending hit over £4 million in the Transfer market this week showing that the global economy is in such a bad way due to these kind of extravagant spendings,consumers,retailers and supporters dont recieve any benefits from this spending.Ticket prices rise yearly to cover Team spending,so lets stop playing Monopoly with real money in the Football League and let the Fans recieve some discounts,after all if teams didnt spend so much ticket prices and replica kits would be lower promoting more sales,to see the games,thus giving money to teams the right way.
